extendedInfo.description: Turn best moments into amazing movies. An automatic video editor that creates stunning short movies from all your best videos and photos. One of Clinch's coolest feature is that it helps you create a collaborative movie by combining and editing your content with videos and photos from friends around you.To make your movie even more stunning Clinch offers you to add the best related pics and clips from Instagram, Twitter, panoramic views from Google, nearby tweets and more cool stuff, all based on your location!It all happens automatically:Record or upload videos and photos from your camera roll. Add captions, choose a style, a soundtrack and add more clips from your friends, Instagram and Twitter... With a click of a button Clinch analyzes the best parts. It then edits it all together (hands freeâ¦) with amazing transitions, filters and more. Clinch is especially great when you and friends go together to music concerts, sport events and partiesâ¦ Capture it, and let Clinch do the rest. You can also explore movies by other users, see whatâs trending around the world and whatâs popular nearby. Follow other clinchers to add them to your movie feed and share movies on Twitter, Facebook, SMS and Email.Features:+ Automatic video editing (Everything is edited and stored in the cloud). + Clinch finds and combines all related videos and photos around you.+ Choose how and who to mix your videos with. + You control the privacy of your content.+ Unlimited uploads and storage!+ Browse, Like and comment on friends and other clinchersâ movies.+ Follow other users and get notifications when your video stars in other movies. + Explore popular and nearby movies.+ Live feed of your friendâs best and favorite movies.+ Instant movie sharing to Twitter, Facebook, and Email.+ More cool stuff!For feedback / report bugs / cool tips - please contact us at info@clinch.co

reviews.title: Samsung S3
reviews.comment: The app crashed the first two times I tried to create something. Great concept but I don\'t have the time to deal with apps crashing.
reviews.author: Vaughan Turner

reviews.title: It now works better.
reviews.comment: *Edit 2* It works a whole lot better now. The gallery works a lot faster. But if like me you have a lot of pictures it still loads all the files. Maybe a simpler solution would be that the user could tell the app a self designated file path so that you could setup a new folder and move pictures and videos into it. That way only the stuff you want is in there.  I also went to download a video only to get a message that it\'s \302\2430.54 To download a video with material that I have supplied. No can do. :-(
reviews.author: Paul S

reviews.title: Fix gallery
reviews.comment: I\'m trying to choose videos and photos from my gallery but it takes FOREVER to load because I have so many saved on my phone. I\'m almost to the point of giving up.
reviews.author: Julie Eclevia

reviews.title: Cant wait
reviews.comment: Looking forward for the updated version so I can download and save it into ym gallery and upload it onto instagram :))))
reviews.author: Crystal Leong

reviews.title: A lot of potential
reviews.comment: This apparently has a lot of potential. Some suggestions: - Allow us to save the rendered movies into our smartphone galleries - Allow us to delete the rendered videos from our profiles  - Option of not choosing any theme when we render videos, I.e. more flexibility/creativity can be exercised on users end.  - Allow us to render a 15sec video for Instagram video  Thanks! Keep up the gd work.
reviews.author: Melissa Leong

reviews.title: Buggy
reviews.comment: Stuck screen fixed, but now when updating profile the \"Unfortunately, clinch as stopped\" message appears.
reviews.author: Juan Carlos Ortega Garc\303\255a

reviews.title: Awesomeness
reviews.comment: Awesome app other video editors do a job, Vine & Instagram add some dynamics, Clinch ads Life.  Smartly though this is TNG of social video.
reviews.author: Mario Rattner

reviews.title: Amazing App ! Creating movies together with friends...
reviews.comment: Very cool and easy to use video app - lets you combine your pics and clips with cool pics around from Instagram , twitter and friends.
reviews.author: Oz Etzioni

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Won\'t go past the registration screen.
reviews.author: Thomas Sciesinski

reviews.title: Great app!!!
reviews.comment: Created movie in a minutes from my photos and videos.
reviews.author: Inbar Even Chen

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: Only loads so many of my videos and pics crashes after I make my first selection. Uninstall.
reviews.author: Yolanda Altheimer
